testcase.name: ClickUp Folder and List Test
testcase.system-out: Given Test space exists and contains the correct information................passed When User creates a new folder "Test Folder" in the existing test space and checks data.passed And User creates a new list "Test List" in the existing test folder.........passed And User verifies that list name "Test List" is correct and added to the correct folder "Test Folder".passed And User creates a new list comment "List Comment" in the existing test list "Test List" and verifies name.passed And User creates a new task "List Task" in the existing list "Test List"....passed And User verifies that task name "List Task" is correct.....................passed And User adds one comment "Task Comment" in the existing list task "List Task".passed And User removes the task "List Task" from the list "Test List".............passed Then User verifies that the task "List Task" is no longer present in the list "Test List".passed
